title: Dad who fathered at least six children with daughter found guilty of rape
text:
He was found guilty of 36 counts of rape and one of sexual assault (Picture: Getty Images)

A dad accused of fathering at least six children with his own daughter has been found guilty of 36 counts of rape.

The man, from south west Wales, was accused of using elements of witchcraft and the occult to manipulate his victims into performing sexual acts.

He also repeatedly raped one of the children he had with his daughter, as well as another one of his daughters, Swansea Crown Court was told.

The jury took four hours and 23 minutes to deliberate before he was convicted, in what Judge Paul Thomas called ‘one of the worst cases I’ve heard in 40 years’.

The man, who cannot be named in order to protect the identity of his victims, was also found guilty of one charge of sexual assault.

The court heard the abuse was carried out over a period of 20 years.

Denying the allegations, the defendant stated that he had began a sexual relationship with his daughter when she was 14.

He claimed she then blackmailed him into continuing the relationship, which he did not want, adding that he didn’t know at the time that she was his biological child.

However the man told the court he accepted that ‘everybody believed I was’.

The judge told the jury to put their emotions to one side and examine the case ‘with your heads and not your hearts’ and they found the defendant guilty on all counts.

He then thanked the jurors, telling them: ‘I have been involved in criminal cases as a barrister and as a judge for 40 years. This is in the top three worst cases I have ever had to deal with.

‘I’m used to it, but for you to have to listen to this sort of evidence must have been a difficult experience. I can only thank you for doing your duty.’

He told the defendant: ‘You will not be surprised to hear a very long prison sentence awaits you.’

The man has since been remanded into custody and will be jailed on October 18.
